# Palmetto Flow App Module

This module is a basic app module that glues
all of your components and services together.

## usage

``` js
require('pfc-app')({
  flow: 'pfc-pouchdb',
  state: {
    title: 'Foo',
    ref: 'home'
  },
  services: [
    require('auth/service')
  ],
  components: [
    require('auth/login'),
    require('home')
  ],
  routes: require('./routes')
});

```

## install

``` sh
npm install pfc-app --save
```
